name: Careful Deer
description:
Carefully now, deer. 

You are just a baby fawn learning how to use those wibbly-wobbly legs of yours. See if you can find some berries as you learn to walk in the forest. We're all very proud of you.

Use the keyboard to control each part of your long legs in a QWOP style, chaotic stumble around the forest in search of berries. Can you find them all?

This game was made in 3 days for Ludum Dare 49 in Unity. All assets and code were made in this time, except for music which is from the wonderful Incompetech. Full attribution below.

Music:

Devonshire Waltz Andante by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/7914-devonshire-waltz-andante

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
